Package com.aspose.html.api

Interface DocumentApi


  • public interface DocumentApi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentByUrl​(java.lang.String sourceUrl)
      Return all HTML page with linked resources packaged as a ZIP archive by the source page URL.

      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentByXPathByUrl​(java.lang.String outFormat, java.lang.String sourceUrl, java.lang.String xPath)
      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query by the source page URL.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentsByCSSSelector​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String outFormat, java.lang.String selector, java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String storage)
      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified CSS selector.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentsByCSSSelectorByUrl​(java.lang.String outFormat, java.lang.String sourceUrl, java.lang.String selector)
      Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified CSS selector by the source page URL.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentImages​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String folder, java.lang.String storage)
      Return all HTML document images packaged as a ZIP archive.
      retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentImagesByUrl​(java.lang.String sourceUrl)
      Return all HTML page images packaged as a ZIP archive by the source page URL.

    • Method Detail

      • GetDocumentByUrl

        @Headers("Content-Type:application/json")
@GET("html/download")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentByUrl​(@Query("sourceUrl")
                                                      java.lang.String sourceUrl)
        Return all HTML page with linked resources packaged as a ZIP archive by the source page URL.
        Parameters:
        sourceUrl - Source page URL. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<ResponseBody>

      • GetDocumentFragmentByXPath

        @Headers("Content-Type:application/json")
@GET("html/{name}/fragments/{outFormat}")
retrofit2.Call<okhttp3.ResponseBody> GetDocumentFragmentByXPath​(@Path("name")
                                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                                @Path("outFormat")
                                                                java.lang.String outFormat,
                                                                @Query("xPath")
                                                                java.lang.String xPath,
                                                                @Query("storage")
                                                                java.lang.String storage,
                                                                @Query("folder")
                                                                java.lang.String folder)
        Return list of HTML fragments matching the specified XPath query.
        Parameters:
        name - The document name (required). Presented as zip archive with one html file in the root or html file.
        outFormat - Output format. Possible values: 'plain' and 'json'. (required)
        xPath - XPath query string. (required)
        storage - The document storage. (optional)
        folder - The document folder. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<ResponseBody>

        sourceUrl - Source page URL. (required)
